Title: American Relief Agency - Report on American relief work. 10
Notes: (Upper image) The more than 1,300 hospitals and medical stations nationwide provide American relief. Here, a doctor tests a girl’s blood.(Lower image) Looking at a nurse giving medicine to a mother. The American Relief Agency has already set up a number of specialized clinics to treat serious illnesses.Nr. 10 of the poster set on the Economic Aid Agreement between the United States of America and the Republic of China (3 July 1948).
